predicate.note: Frames file for 'stock' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 9.7-1, other framed members include inject, spread, stack. No comparison with those, but following trend of verbnet.

example.name: all args
example.text: John stocked his fallout shelter with a year's supply of Twinkies and YooHoo.
example.arg: a year's supply of Twinkies and YooHoo

example.name: no location
example.text: John's hardware store doesn't stock any actual hardware.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: And while customers such as steel service centers are continuing to reduce inventories through the fourth quarter, they eventually will begin stocking up again, he notes.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Last year's drought in the Midwest prompted retailers to stock up on oils ahead of anticipated price increases, boosting sales for Crisco and Puritan oils, analysts said.
